name: Just Don't Fall
description:
This is our first game made during Game Off 2019 challenge.

Rules are simple - push enemies to lava with fast dash... and JUST DONT FALL!

\(^.^)/ 

Created with:

  • GameMaker Studio 2
  • Aseprite
  • BeepBox

Special thanks for assets:

  • https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

  • https://ppeldo.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-game-spellmagic-fx
